body_html:
Yay 🎉 that's perfect and exactly what I was talking about. Sorry if I did not make myself that clear before 🙈 . As for the comment: could also have been me who overlooked / lost it - my Github notifications are a constant information overload... 🚚

Anyways: do you wanna continue the additions proposes by @F3PiX in a separate PR then? Do you want a ticket for it or is it enough for you if you can go back to this thread right here @mbrien12 ?

And again: million thanx for your efforts 💚
